title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Program for Improving Mathematical Learning Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of algebraic expressions
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve a weekly task participation rate of 80% or higher on gamification platforms.
Learners establish self-directed learning plans incorporating game elements (e.g., experience points, level-ups, team missions) during math problem-solving processes.
Learners will improve their ability to apply basic mathematical concepts by at least 30% through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
